text: Ani na tumhi tura parvatakade hajara hote jevha amhi (musala) pukarale hote. Kimbahuna hi tumacya palanakartyatarphe krpa hoya, yasathi ki tumhi asa lokanna khabaradara karave, jyancyajavala tumacyapurvi koni khabaradara karanara pohacala nahi. Navala navhe ki tyanni bodha prapta karuna ghyava
